SaveImplementation.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_ADD_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYRESERVEBUSINESSEXTENSION ( @ID uniqueidentifier = null output, @CONTEXTID uniqueidentifier, @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @SOLICITORID uniqueidentifier = null ) as
set nocount on;
set @ID = @CONTEXTID
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate()
begin try -- handle inserting the data insert into dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYRESERVEPROCESSEXTENSION (ID, SOLICITORID, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED) values (@ID, @SOLICITORID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CURRENTDATE, @CURRENTDATE)
end try
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0
